name: fileflows
tagline: A media automation platform for processing, organizing, and managing files

features.title: File Automation
features.description: Process files automatically based on rules, triggers, and custom workflows for hands-free management

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Convert media files between formats with configurable quality, codec, and resolution settings

features.title: Folder Organization
features.description: Watch folders for new files and trigger workflows automatically when content is added

features.title: Plugin System
features.description: Extend functionality with community plugins for additional file formats and processing capabilities

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Handle multiple files simultaneously with parallel execution for faster completion times

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Read and modify file properties, tags, and embedded information during processing

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Receive alerts when workflows complete, fail, or require attention via email or webhooks
